definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Linear temperature control system in TSC measurement has been developed by using microprocessor.
sentences.chinese: 利用單板機完成了TSC測試中的線性升溫控制系統。

sentences.english: The data acquisition and processing are carried out by a single board computer.
sentences.chinese: 用單板機進行數據採集和處理，打印輸出測量結果。

sentences.english: The Micro professor single board Microcomputer implements performance of logic control using software structure.
sentences.chinese: 小教授單板機是利用軟件設備來完成邏輯控制的功能。

sentences.english: The controller is essentially a single-board microcomputer with a few peripheral devices.
sentences.chinese: 該控制器實際上是帶有少量外圍設備的單板機。

sentences.english: The program-controlled features of the single-board microcomputer were fully used.
sentences.chinese: 該機儘量利用單板機的程序控制能力。
